projects.title: Gradient
projects.description: Gradient is a web application aimed towards students for making studying more enjoyable. It has a built-in Pomodoro timer hooked to a leaderboard, and an AI tool that summarizes and improves formatting of study notes.

projects.title: Omninventory
projects.description: Omninventory is an Android application that allows users to keep track of their inventory. It has a built-in barcode scanner, and a feature that allows users to share their inventory with others.
